column1: The Purple Pig////Based on all the reviews on Yelp
column2: it seems like there's always a long wait. However
column3: I lucked out and only had to wait 15 minutes on Lolapalooza Sunday (around 5:30PM!!) I saw that they had a post-it note estimating how long the wait would be based on what time of day it is
column4: so don't give up when the host tells you that the wait is super long! Be patient
column5: and walk around magnificent mile while you're at it!
